AbilityScoreFeature.Name: Belt of Hill Giant Strength
AbilityScoreFeature.Text: While wearing this belt, your Strength changes to 21. If your Strength is already equal to or greater than 21, the item has no effect on you.

MagicProperty.Name: Belt of Hill Giant Strength
MagicProperty.Description: While wearing this belt, your Strength changes to 21. If your Strength is already equal to or greater than 21, the item has no effect on you.
MagicProperty.Source: The Rise of Tiamat Online Supplement
